title: TING INOX BVE 60L SKP (DES)
description:
Capacity: 60L
Dimensions:
Width 435mm
Height 672mm
Voltage:220 V
Power 2500 W
Connection: Single
Inlet/Outlet (Top-Left) 1/2M
Connection: 14mm
Material of the tank: Stainless Steel AISI 304(1.4301)
Insulated polyurethane
Controlled by a thermostat. Option for setting the desired temperature
Protection against water leaks, electric shocks and overheating
Working pressure: 6 bar
Protection class: IP24
Maximum temperature: 75°C/99°C
Protection class: IP24
Anti-corrosion system-Magnesium anode
